message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm being generous!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't expect much more!
You're not being generous enough, time to get tough!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not going to give away the farm!
You're getting desperate, I can smell it! Time to make a serious offer!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll make one more serious offer, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
